item.title: CVE-2024-3826|2024-07-30T17:53:03.158Z -- akana -- akana%20api%20platform
item.description: In versions of Akana in versions prior to and including 2022.1.3 validation is broken when using the SAML Single Sign-On (SSO) functionality.
